data.name: Century - Introduction Pack
data.detailed_description:
Take it to the skies and become a legendary dragon rider, with an extra jump start thanks to the Introduction Pack!

The Introduction Pack includes:
  • 300 Gems
  • 2,000 Silver
  • 3-Day XP Booster
  • Player Icon
data.about_the_game:
Take it to the skies and become a legendary dragon rider, with an extra jump start thanks to the Introduction Pack!

The Introduction Pack includes:
  • 300 Gems
  • 2,000 Silver
  • 3-Day XP Booster
  • Player Icon
data.short_description: Take it to the skies and become a legendary dragon rider, with an extra jump start thanks to the Introduction Pack!
data.supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, French, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6Ghz or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8Ghz or AMD Ryzen 5 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
